remarks: The meet of two different lattice lines in a lattice plane is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jul-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2llnm2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2llnm2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnm2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2llnm2.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2llnm2.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2llnm2N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N /\ W e. P ) /\ ( X .<_ W /\ Y .<_ W /\ X =/= Y ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. A ) $.
